statements: UPSERT INTO Entertainment (id, title, genre, release_date) VALUES (1, 'Movie 1', 'Action', '2022-01-01')
UPSERT INTO Entertainment (id, title, genre, release_date) VALUES (2, 'TV Show 1', 'Drama', '2022-02-15')
UPSERT INTO Entertainment (id, title, genre, release_date) VALUES (3, 'Documentary 1', 'History', '2022-03-10')
UPSERT INTO movies (id, title, genre, release_year) VALUES (1, 'Movie 1', 'Action', 2021) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = 'Movie 1', genre = 'Action', release_year = 2021;
UPSERT INTO actors (id, name, age, gender) VALUES (1, 'Actor 1', 30, 'Male') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Actor 1', age = 30, gender = 'Male';
UPSERT INTO movies (id, title, genre, release_year) VALUES (2, 'Movie 2', 'Comedy', 2020) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = 'Movie 2', genre = 'Comedy', release_year = 2020;
UPSERT INTO Movies (id, title, genre, release_year) VALUES (1, 'Star Wars', 'Science Fiction', 1977) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Star Wars', genre = 'Science Fiction', release_year = 1977
UPSERT INTO TVShows (id, title, genre, release_year) VALUES (1, 'Breaking Bad', 'Drama', 2008) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Breaking Bad', genre = 'Drama', release_year = 2008
UPSERT INTO Actors (id, name, age, gender) VALUES (1, 'Tom Hanks', 65, 'Male') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Tom Hanks', age = 65, gender = 'Male'
UPSERT INTO movies (movie_id, title, genre, release_date) VALUES (1, 'The Avengers', 'Action', '2012-05-04');
UPSERT INTO actors (actor_id, first_name, last_name, dob, gender) VALUES (1, 'Robert', 'Downey Jr.', '1965-04-04', 'Male');
UPSERT INTO directors (director_id, first_name, last_name, dob) VALUES (1, 'Christopher', 'Nolan', '1970-07-30');
INSERT INTO movies (title, genre, release_date) VALUES ('The Matrix', 'Sci-Fi', '1999-03-31') ON CONFLICT (title) DO UPDATE SET genre = EXCLUDED.genre;
INSERT INTO actors (name, age, gender) VALUES ('Keanu Reeves', 56, 'Male') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET age = EXCLUDED.age;

INSERT INTO directors (name, age, gender, nationality) VALUES ('Lana Wachowski', 56, 'Female', 'American') ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET gender = EXCLUDED.gender, nationality = EXCLUDED.nationality;
